疦字的基本解释

疦
jué
口歪斜。

疦
xuè
疮里空。
疮大。

疦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《廣韻》古穴切，入屑，見。］
口不正。
[②]［xuè］
［《廣韻》呼决切，入屑，曉。］
(1)疮里空。
(2)疮大者。

疦字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　疦； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页770第08
【廣韻】【集韻】?呼決切，音血。【廣韻】瘡裏空也。【集韻】瘡大者疦。　又【唐韻】【集韻】?古穴切，音玦。【說文】?也。【五音集韻】?者，口咼也。

疦字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
疦字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Guangyun" ancient acupoint cutting, into the scraps, see. ]
Smell of mouth.
[②]［xuè］
["Guangyun" call for a decisive cut, into the crumbs, Xiao. ]
(1) The sore is empty.
(2) Those with large sores.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　疦; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 770 08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Call for determination, sound and blood. [Guang Yun] The sore is also empty. 【Ji Yun】Scares with large sores.　[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ancient acupoint cut, Yin Jue. [Said the text]? Also. 【Pentagram rhyme】? Those who have a mouthful.
